amendment.description: Amendment allows the FAA to assist in establishing a NextGen Research and Development Center of Excellence which would leverage the FAA's existing Centers of Excellence Program to provide educational, technical, and analytical assistance to the FAA and other agencies involved in the development of NextGen.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 112-46 to allow the FAA to assist in establishing a NextGen Research and Development Center of Excellence. The Center would leverage the FAA's existing centers of excellence program, a program that relies on several university consortia to address ongoing FAA research and development challenges. The Center would provide educational, technical, and analytical assistance to the FAA and other agencies involved in the development of NextGen.
